Name: Lollo Campaign VI
Description: You have a new "Lollo Eater" order. Please fulfill it in time.
QuestDesc: You have a new "Lollo Eater" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You might not believe what the business plan is when I tell you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your encounters yesterday inspired me. I've developed a new business overnight.

Options.PlotLineKey: What business? We go begging for food?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nah! We're helping people eat stuff! And we make money from that! It's called "Lollo Eater"!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jewel Boba has launched a collab event with the popular game, "Second Coming of Solaris."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Players can buy collab drink at Jewel Boba for a chance to get limited edition redemption codes. The hype is crazy!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They get the codes, we get to drink boba and make money. It's a win-win!

Options.PlotLineKey: How many cups before we get the guaranteed?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me see... One cup for one pull....

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait! The fine print here... is this the lottery probability rules?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Starting from the 50th cup, the probability of winning increases, and the guaranteed drop appears by the 60th cup.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before placing an order, you have to shout the slogan: Present endless treasures to the Second Coming of Solaris!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding!...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have a new...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have a new order...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have a new order... Ding! Ding! Ding!

Options.PlotLineKey: If I gain extra weight from this, it'll be on you.
Can I apply for a work injury compensation?
It's not too late to give up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't underestimate me! Present endless treasures to the Second Coming of Solaris!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jewel Boba Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome to "the Second Coming of Solaris: Jewel Station". How many cups would you like?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Present endless treasures to the Second Coming of Solaris! I'll have 100 cups of boba!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And make half of them large, no ice, and less sugar please!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What about you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jewel Boba Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, please shout out our slogan loudly.

Options.PlotLineKey: Present endless treasures to the Second Coming of Solaris!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Order #1: 5 cups, 0 code.
Order #2: 30 cups, 1 code.
Order #3: 22 cups, 1 code.
Order #4: 1 cup, 1 code.
Order #5: 10 cups, 2 codes...

With 68 cups of boba in your stomach, you and Maji call it quits earlier than you expected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry. I underestimated the enthusiasm of those players... Hic! I won't ever try something like this again.

Options.PlotLineKey: Hic! It's okay, I understand. I forgive you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks. That's very sweet of you to say.

Options.PlotLineKey: As sweet as the boba, yeah.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't do this. Hic... I can present no more treasure. Won't be able to work as a courier again if I go out of shape from this...

Options.PlotLineKey: You are no longer a courier, though.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hic... I forgot. Haven't gotten used to my new occupation yet.
